post.body: Aw that is such a beautiful song.
#oscarwildeday is the greatest idea ever. In short, "It is through disobedience and rebellion that progress has been made."
Indeed. Our (myself and boy's) 1 yr anniversary is Monday so I'm making a silly scrapbook of pictures since I've met him.
thanks love
You too! Though I must admit I would much rather have any sort of dinner with you than be stuck here with my insane family.
You just missed obvious weirdness and a really hot kiss.
For sure! and we can seduce them in the process.
Working fine for me!
That's It's a Wonderful Life. He gets fired, wants to die and the angel saves and shows him the world would be like w.o him.
Welcome to the madness lover.
omg that is the worst. I have 4 finals tomorrow and the ONE page i need for my notes refuses to load. AHHHHHH
hello to you too! and blackboard is an evil, evil creation.
***HUGS*** I love you too darling. Thank you!
HAPPY BIRTHDAYYYYYYYYY
omg is everyone and thing ok?!
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!
What movie were you watching?
Welcome to twitter love.
THERE WAS SO MUCH CAPSLOCK GHEY! IT WAS AMAZING! ADAM BEING CUTE. MICHAEL BEING EMOTI. RUSSELL AS A SLASH FIEND. EVIL FRANKIE!
omg lets exchange n00dz with our cams. lolz
'ello love!
@jamieaiken919 Wow I just checked Twitter for the first time today and you guys are all the entries for 10 pg back. lolz.
Oh god i feel for you. That is horrible.
Same here! I got Christmas Eve off, so i have to work 530-close the day after. Ah well, money is money love.
YAYYYYYY! Glad you like it!
Hmm, I could go to bed now but I'm too lazy. I think I'll watch how i met your mother and read haroun and the sea of stories. : ]
New OSCLA board at www.oscla.info/board
Man, making a 40 page scrapbook is hard.
Fuuuuuck retail. I got up at 5:57am and I'll be at work till 4pm. Please kill me. At least text me.
Who invented pie? I bet Stephen Fry taught me on QI once and I cannot remember. Either that or I'll wait for series P of QI.
Ugh I hate Thanksgiving. So pointless. Get me out of this house please.
hey livejournal, how about you stop sucking hardcore and actually work for once.
I love my boyfriend more than life itself.
Why is Livejournal sucking so hard right now?
A Colbert Christmas is the best gift I could have asked for. That was amazing.
I want to hang out with Russell Howard, Sean Lock, Rich Hall, Michael McIntyre and Jimmy Carr. What a fucking party that would be.
Stupid Verizon Wireless. They can't get anything right.
Omg South Park is amazing. I love this show.
Bah I hate having to get up early. Darn you book buyback day!
I LOVE SNOW. It's so pretty outside. Looooove it.
Getting Kyle this for christmas: http://www.thinkgeek.com/geektoys/plush/6708/images/3360/
Stephen Fry's website is the greatest thing ever.
WELL NOW EVERY BODY'S HEARD, ABOUT THE BIRD. B-B-BIRD, BIRD BIRD, BIRD IS THE WORD.
I HATE BLACKBOARD! LOAD YOU BITCH!
Bahh packing for home may take me a few years. Why do I have so many clothes!?
No one should ever wake up with a headache.
My leg is cramping and i keep crying because of my friends. Both for good and bad reasons. I wish i could meet internet friends In real life
The fact that I have over 1/2 the songs on the Pitchfork best songs of the year makes me feel really pretentious and i kinda like it. : /
Well this is the story all about how my life got switched turned upside down
Yay! I am in a vicodin induced haze. Also, everyone should get their christmas cards this week!
Bah I'm getting 2 teeth pulled in 2 hours. Wish me luck!
Is LJ being a bitch for anyone else? My friends page wont load. Grrrr. But i did buy some lingerie today for New Years Eve! hehe.
DOCTOR WHO CHRISTMAS SPECIAL!!!!! AHHHHH!!!!!
My parents got me I Like You, Colbert Christmas, 50$ to Borders and the Colbert tote bag from Barnes and Noblet!!! AHHHH! I LOVE CHRISTMAS!
Merry Non-denomination wintry holiday!
I already got HIMYM and Tropic Thunder. This Christmas rocks.
WEEKELY MOCKINGS WERE AMAZING TONIGHT. FRANKIE = DAVROS!
Why is my room so cold?!
Spending today with Kyle eating food I really shouldn't and shopping for last minute gifts at Barnes and Noblet. Should be very excellent!
Dear god chicken parmesan is amazing.
I just got a Skype account and I have no idea what I'm doing.
